subtitle.Text: It's weird hanging out with girls.
Daniel was around ever since I was little, and other girls... I dunno.
But being around Lonnie is like... instantly just right.
I gave her the grand Psycho House tour, and took my revenge on Super Nintendo,
and it was like, I dunno, I finally found someone I feel normal around.
I drove her home and she gave me this tape and said "you have GOT to listen to this."
I haven't stopped playing it since.
